snippet.title: Survive the Nights - Alpha 1.5 Showcase Trailer (Hordes | Fortifications ++)
snippet.description:
This video showcases many of the new mechanics and features in 1.5. Alpha 1.5 patch includes the addition of freeplaced fortifications, hordes, many QoL tweaks and much more. Check out our changelog for more details. If you’ve not played in some time please jump back in and give us some updated feedback.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/541300/Survive_the_Nights/
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/survive-the-nights

Changelog: https://changelog.survivethenights.net/
Discord: https://discord.gg/survivethenights
Forum: https://community.survivethenights.net
Twitter: https://twitter.com/STNgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/STNgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/a2zinteractive
Merch Shop: https://teespring.com/stores/a2zinteractive
Website: https://www.survivethenights.net
